LandingPage.Description: Your ultimate platform for cloud application hosting.

WelcomeEmail.earn-more-credits: Earn even more credits by sharing!
WelcomeEmail.earn-more-credits-explain:
Use your unique referral code to invite friends and colleagues. 
Each person who signs up with your code will earn you both credits at launch.
WelcomeEmail.earn-more-credits-observation:
You and your referral will each earn $5 in credits. 
Limit of 2 nominations per IP address and 1 per device. 
Maximum $30 in free credits per user.
WelcomeEmail.footer-1:
We remain at your disposal for any questions. 
Thank you so much for being part of this journey!

WelcomeEmail.help-us-3: Just fill out our quick form sharing your needs and expectations:

Thank you for your interest! 
Help us build the best cloud solution for automations and earn credits.
WelcomeEmail.title: Welcome to Ezzy Cloud!

We are very happy with your interest in our platform. 
We are working hard to create an exceptional automation cloud solution tailored to your needs.
